stories.text: With the iPod going away, I am curious if anybody is doing anything besides repurposing old smartphones for pocket digital audio.
stories.title: ASK HN: Is anybody building their own portable dumb audio players?

stories.text:
Not necessarily classics. Include books that are beginner friendly in a pedagogic sense. Classics need a little bit of expertise or know how of the subject to appreciate. A lot of time beginners get intimidated by classics.

But you can mention classics. Just don't mention only classics. Mention books that can attract people to your subject.
stories.title: Ask HN: What do you think are the top books in your subject of expertise?
Little Known Hacker News Is My First Read Every Morning
